name: quill-mention
description: @mentions for the Quill rich text editor
author: Fredrik Sundqvist <fsundqvist@gmail.com>

scripts.build: esbuild src/*.js --bundle --format=cjs --entry-names=[dir]/[name].cjs --outdir=dist && esbuild src/*.js --bundle --format=esm --entry-names=[dir]/[name].esm --outdir=dist && esbuild src/*.* --bundle --minify --entry-names=[dir]/[name].min --outdir=dist && esbuild src/*.css --outdir=dist
scripts.lint: prettier -w src/ docs/ test.js && eslint --fix src/**.js
scripts.test: prettier -c src/ docs/ test.js && eslint src/**.js && ava
